mapper.sql: m.message_id messageId ,m.user_name userName ,m.user_phone userPhone ,m.user_email userEmail ,m.user_postal_code userPostalCode ,m.user_address userAddress ,m.content content ,m.del_flag delFlag
mapper.select:
select
from message m where m.del_flag=0
and m.message_id like CONCAT('%', #{messageId}, '%')
and m.user_name like CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
and m.user_phone like CONCAT('%', #{userPhone}, '%')
and m.user_email like CONCAT('%', #{userEmail}, '%')
and m.user_postal_code like CONCAT('%', #{userPostalCode}, '%')
and m.user_address like CONCAT('%', #{userAddress}, '%')
and m.content like CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
and m.del_flag like CONCAT('%', #{delFlag}, '%')
limit #{start},#{size}

select message_id AS messageId ,user_name AS userName ,user_phone AS userPhone ,user_email AS userEmail ,user_postal_code AS userPostalCode ,user_address AS userAddress ,content AS content del_flag AS delFlag
from message where messageId=#{messageId}
